activities: As a data processor MemCachier, Inc. provides web hosting and technical services, for its customers. Specifically, MemCachier Inc provides a managed cache service for its customers, collecting arbitrary information that they choose to store in the cache. MemCachier Inc. also collects some personal information from each customer to identify and charge them for provided services. The personal information described above is collected, held and processed for different purposes, which may include any of the following: sales and marketing to businesses; effecting transactions with businesses; supplying services and/or products to such businesses; financial processing and management; supplier relationship management; customer support and customer relationship management; and human resources purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Cooperation with EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss FDPIC pursuant to the Safe Harbor certification.
